content.p: We're here to help you keep connected (or reconnect!) with alumni across our community. Nottingham is the place where so many friendships first began. We're here to help you keep connected (or reconnect!) with alumni across our community. Whether you need some advice on the current Nottingham hotspots to gather with your friends or want to organise something more formal on our campuses we're here to help. What is the reason for getting people together? Are you celebrating a graduation anniversary, do you want to revisit old haunts on campus or simply want to reconnect with your classmates? The reason usually shapes the theme of the event. Choosing the right date and time is important. Events during public holidays and in the week can sometimes be difficult as guests may have other plans. Will the event be in the UK, overseas, on campus or in your back garden? Wherever it is going to be held, we'd love to hear about it and give you the support you need. Are you in touch with your proposed guests or would you like our support to make contact with a specific group? It's up to you who you'd like to invite â€“ whether it's old classmates, neighbours from halls or friends who started in the same year! Our Alumni Engagement team is available to help you through the process. We can provide support by:
